notes.text:
This update for krb5 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2016-3120: KDC NULL Pointer Dereference Denial Of Service Vulnerability (bsc#991088)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The validate_as_request function in kdc_util.c in the Key Distribution Center (KDC) in MIT Kerberos 5 (aka krb5) before 1.13.6 and 1.4.x before 1.14.3, when restrict_anonymous_to_tgt is enabled, uses an incorrect client data structure, which allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and daemon crash) via an S4U2Self request.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
